kansas-city.neighborhoods: Downtown, Westport, Country Club Plaza, Crossroads Arts District, River Market, Brookside
kansas-city.meetingHighlights: Large metro fellowship with cross-state meetings, many speaker nights, and a robust schedule of lunchtime and evening groups.
kansas-city.transitInfo: RideKC bus network and regional transit connect the metro; Kansas City International Airport (MCI) serves national and international flights.

springfield.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Galloway, Rountree, South Campbell, Northern Heights
springfield.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and suburban meetings with several AA service groups and regular speaker events.
springfield.transitInfo: Springfield Transit Services provides local routes; Springfieldâ€“Branson National Airport for regional flights.

st-louis.neighborhoods: Downtown, The Delmar Loop, Central West End, Soulard, Lafayette Square, Clayton
st-louis.meetingHighlights: Extensive meeting options across neighborhoods and suburbs with long-established groups and numerous specialty meetings.
st-louis.transitInfo: MetroLink light rail and MetroBus provide transit across the region; St. Louis Lambert International Airport (STL) serves national flights.

columbia.meetingHighlights: University-area meetings with strong student involvement and a mix of lunchtime, evening, and study-format meetings.
columbia.transitInfo: Go COMO provides local transit; Columbia Regional Airport serves regional flights.

jefferson-city.meetingHighlights: Capital-city meetings with steady weekday attendance and several civic-group hosted meetings.
jefferson-city.transitInfo: Jefferson City Transit provides local service; regional highways and small regional airports connect the area.

independence.neighborhoods: Downtown Independence, Noland Road, Blue Ridge, Santa Fe Hills
independence.meetingHighlights: Active suburban meetings serving eastern KC metro; strong Truman Library area fellowship with regular speaker meetings.
independence.transitInfo: RideKC buses connect Independence to Kansas City metro; Kansas City International Airport (MCI) accessible via highway.
